result.reason: The current single-instance logic switches focus to the running instance but fails to pass the command-line arguments (like `--connect`) to it, requiring an IPC mechanism (e.g., Named Pipes) to be added.
result.approach: Implement a Named Pipe server in ProgramRoot to listen for arguments from subsequent instances; refactor StartupArgumentsInterpreter to handle runtime requests.

attempts.raw_output:
